Package distibuted.socket.middleware

Class ServerSocketHandler

java.lang.Object
distibuted.socket.middleware.SocketHandler<ServerInterface>
distibuted.socket.middleware.ServerSocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, Remote, CommonGoalView, GameView, LivingRoomView, PersonalGoalView, PlayerChatView, PlayerView, ShelfView, UserView, ViewCollection
public class ServerSocketHandler extends SocketHandler<ServerInterface> implements ClientInterface
This class manages a socket connection on server side

    • bind

      public void bind(ServerInterface server) throws RemoteException
      This method binds a client to a server

      Generates and send SocketObject that calls ClientInterface.bind(ServerInterface) on receiver

      Create and runs input-stream-handler thread

      Specified by:
      bind in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      server - the ServerInterface of the server that client have to bind to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if fails to send a SocketObject
